channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: TechRadar's Year in Review 2025 – the biggest trends in AI, phones, computing, TVs, gaming and more
item.description: It's been quite the year for tech! Here's our round up of the biggest trends in phones, computing, TVs, gaming, cameras, streaming and more in 2025.

item.title: OpenAI bets big on audio as Silicon Valley declares war on screens
item.description: The form factors may differ, but the thesis is the same: audio is the interface of the future. Every space -- your home, your car, even your face -- is becoming an interface.

item.title: LG’s new karaoke-ready party speaker uses AI to remove song vocals
item.description: LG is adding a karaoke-focused party speaker to its lineup of Xboom devices, which is built in collaboration with Will.i.am. Announced this week, LG says the Stage 501 speaker comes with an "AI Karaoke Master" that can remove or adjust vocals from "virtually any song," similar to the Soundcore Rave 3S. It can also adjust […]

item.title: Un robot aspirateur-laveur puissant à moins de 130 € ? C’est chez Roborock que ça se passe
item.description: Les robots qui aspirent et lavent en même temps sont généralement assez onéreux. Mais des pépites accessibles existent, à l'image du Roborock Q7 L5, qu'Amazon affiche à 129,98 euros au lieu de 159,99 euros.

item.title: How to watch the Hisense CES 2026 presentation live
item.description: Xinhua News Agency via Getty Images Hisense is generally best known for its budget-friendly electronics and appliances, like TVs and refrigerators. However, at CES 2025, the China-based company showcased its high-end capabilities with a massive 136-inch micro LED TV, which has recently become available for a staggering $100,000. So what's on deck for this year's show? New leadership, for starters. The company has two new hires, including Chief Marketing Officer Sarah Larsen and Chief Commercial Officer James Fishler. In a press release, Hisense said Fishler's experience in home entertainment, ...

item.title: 42 New Sci-Fi, Fantasy, and Horror Books Releasing in January
item.description: Happy New Year, and happy new books!

item.title: Our 14 most anticipated games of 2026 prove that there's more to look forward to than just Grand Theft Auto 6
item.description: These are all the games that you should be keeping an eye on in 2026.

item.title: Asus RP-AX58: low-cost Wi-Fi 6 range extender for tackling Wi-Fi deadspots
item.description: Have a part of your home or office that your Wi-Fi signal just cannot reach? The Asus RP-AX58 is an affordable way to fix that.

item.title: John Lewis January sale: today's 12 best deals on appliances, TVs, laptops, Dyson, and more
item.description: John Lewis's January Sales offer excellent price cuts across a wide range of categories - here are the 12 best deals I've found today.

item.title: Marvel Rings In 2026 With a ‘Wonder Man’ Trailer
item.description: A new year means new Marvel shows to watch, and the first to come in 2026 is 'Wonder Man.'

item.title: C’est toujours la panade pour l’Apple Vision Pro
item.description: Le lancement discret d'une nouvelle version plus puissante du Vision Pro cette année n'y aura pas suffi : le casque de réalité mixte d'Apple ne se vendrait pas au niveau espéré par le constructeur. Ce dernier aurait d'ailleurs réduit le budget pub de… 95 %.

item.title: Ces 5 voitures électriques qui ont frôlé la catastrophe à leur lancement : roues qui se détachent, pannes de clim, freinage d’urgence, etc.
item.description: Lancer un nouveau produit sur le marché n'est jamais chose aisée. Pour les constructeurs automobiles, les voitures électriques représentent un challenge supplémentaire, avec parfois quelques déconvenues lors des débuts. Voici quelques modèles qui ont eut des débuts plutôt chaotiques.

item.title: How to watch Red Eye season 2 — free streams from anywhere
item.description: Hana Li (Jing Lusi) has no option but to navigate a political incident with Martin Compston's spiky head of security Clay. Here's how to watch Red Eye season 2 online.

item.title: Sunderland vs Man City live streams: How to watch Premier League 2025-26 from anywhere in the world
item.description: We'll show you how to watch Sunderland vs Man City live streams from anywhere in the world as Haaland and co look to continue their run of Premier League wins.

item.title: Amazon just launched a massive winter sale — clearance prices on TVs, Fitbit, AirPods and more
item.description: Amazon just launched a massive winter sale with clearance prices on TVs, smartwatches, Apple devices, kitchen appliances, vacuums, and more.

item.title: Scandale des « bikini deepfakes » : l’IA d’Elon Musk détournée pour déshabiller des mineures et des femmes
item.description: Depuis quelques jours, le fil X est inondé de photos de femmes « déshabillées » par Grok. Le chatbot, sous prétexte de « liberté d'expression » et de refus de la censure « woke », a ouvert les vannes au grand n'importe quoi.
